_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Deno [1.0]
author: contact@inetol.net
startup: curl -fsSL https://deno.land/x/install/install.sh | sh && export DENO_INSTALL="/home/container/.deno" && export PATH="$DENO_INSTALL/bin:$PATH" && if [[ {{DIR}} == *"/"* ]]; then cd {{DIR}}; fi; deno run {{FLAGS}} {{FILE}}

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update && apt upgrade -y && apt install -y curl unzip && apt autoremove -y && apt autoclean && apt clean && curl -fsSL https://deno.land/x/install/install.sh | sh && echo -e 'export DENO_INSTALL="/root/.deno" && export PATH="$DENO_INSTALL/bin:$PATH"' >> .bashrc
echo -e ""
echo -e "Install complete!"
echo -e ""
exit 0

variables.name: Startup File
variables.description: The file that starts the Deno program.

variables.name: File Directory
variables.description:
Go to the folder where the program is located.

The directory ALWAYS ends with "/" (ex: "src/")
